data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Niamey access to a Bible in their own language.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Niamey, Niger
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 1,302,900 people living in Niamey through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 103 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, make the 12,614 believers in Niamey to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 1,290,286 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 12,614 believers in the state of Niamey the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.

Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Tuareg, Asben people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Niamey.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Niamey, Niger to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 1,290,286 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.section_summary:
the state of Niamey, Niger has a population of 1,302,900.

We estimate Niamey has 12,614 people who might know Jesus, 7,808 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,282,478 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 103 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 12,614 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.
